instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a responsive Sidebar layout with a fixed width of 260px on desktop.
Use the primary color #C64091 for all primary actions, active tab states, and key highlights.
Ensure the 'Seller Hub' is the default landing page with the 6 required tabs.
Use Shadcn UI components but override the default 'ring' color to match the brand primary #C64091.
For the 'Add Product' flow, use a Stepper component to break down the process into: General Info, Product Info, Tech Info, Go Live.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use 'Manrope' font for headings and 'Inter' for body text. Add these fonts via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
Maintain a clean, white-space heavy layout (p-6 or p-8) to feel professional and uncluttered.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds; stick to solid colors or subtle borders.
Use the provided image URLs for product mockups in the preview pages or dashboard grid.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) where appropriate (e.g., sticky headers).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
